author: Josh Lederman
title: Colleges, universities still waiting for promised emergency aid for students
description: Nearly a month after the economic relief package was signed into law, just 1 in 10 schools that applied for funds for their students have been approved.
content:
Colleges and universities across the U.S. are still waiting for most of the $6.3 billion set aside by Congress to help students struggling to pay for food, housing and child care during the coronavirus pandemic.
And a decision by Education Secretary Betsy De… [+7419 chars]
